mapper.insert: insert into t_order (order_code, user_code, order_status, store_code, remark, pay_time, total_price, pay_status, total_cmd, is_delete, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, version ) values ( #{orderCode}, #{userCode}, #{orderStatus}, #{storeCode}, #{remark}, now(), #{totalPrice}, #{payStatus}, #{totalCmd}, #{isDelete}, #{createUser}, now(), #{updateUser}, now(), 0 )

insert into t_order_detail (detail_code, order_code, com_code, detail_amount, total_price, is_delete, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, version ) values
( #{item.orderDetailsCode}, #{item.orderCode}, #{item.comCode}, #{item.comCount}, #{item.comPrice} * #{item.comCount}, #{item.isDelete}, #{item.createUser}, now(), #{item.updateUser}, now(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT s.store_code storeCode, s.store_name storeName, s.user_code userCode, s.store_phone storePnone, s.invite_code inviteCode, s.business_license businessLicense, CONCAT_WS('-',province.city_name,city.city_name,area.city_name,s.store_address) AS address FROM t_store s LEFT JOIN t_user_client cl ON s.invite_code = cl.invite_code LEFT JOIN city area ON area.id = s.area_code LEFT JOIN city city ON city.id = area.pid LEFT JOIN city province ON province.id = city.pid WHERE s.is_delete = 0 AND cl.user_code = #{userCode}

SELECT cmd.com_code comCode, cmd.pic_path picPath, cmd.com_name comName, cmd.com_present comPresent, cmd.com_price comPrice, cmd.com_sales comSale, cmd.com_stock comStock FROM t_commodity cmd WHERE cmd.is_delete = 0 AND cmd.com_code = #{comCode}

update.foreach: update t_commodity set com_sales = com_sales + #{item.comCount}, com_stock = com_stock - #{item.comCount} where is_delete = 0 and com_code = #{item.comCode}
